known_issues: Build/deploy sometimes fails with a configuration problem ("Please report this to the Caffeine team").

existing_features.title: Update the global styling system to use only 1–2 premium brand colors across the site (for accents, buttons, highlights, gradients, icons, and rings), replacing the current multi-accent palette usage (teal/green/amber/pink/violet/cyan/orange/purple/etc.).

Refactor the accent utility layer (frontend/src/utils/accents.ts) so it no longer rotates through many accent colors by route/subject/index, and instead exposes a small, fixed set of brand accent styles (max two) that components can use consistently.

Update key UI components and pages that currently use multi-color gradients and mixed accent classes (e.g., Header, Footer, HomePage sections) to use a consistent 1–2 color premium theme, including removing multi-stop gradient text that blends multiple accent colors.

new_feature_requests.summary: Improve login and signup performance (make authentication screens/flows faster).
Update site theme to use only 1–2 premium brand colors instead of multiple colors.

projectName: Simplify site theme to 1–2 premium brand colors (remove multi-accent palette)
